name: Argenti
story: A paragon knight of the Knights of Beauty who is piously seeking his missing Aeon, Idrila the Beauty.Forthright and candid, he wanders the cosmos espousing the virtues of Idrila's good name.

skills.name: Fleeting Fragrance
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Justice, Hereby Blooms
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all enemies.

skills.name: For In This Garden, Supreme Beauty Bestows
skills.description: Consumes #2[i] Energy and deals Physical DMG to all enemies.

skills.name: Sublime Object
skills.description: When Argenti uses his Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, he regenerates Energy and increases his CRIT Rate for every enemy target hit.

skills.name: Manifesto of Purest Virtue
skills.description: Inflicts Daze on all enemies within a set area. When attacking a Dazed enemy to enter combat, deals minor Physical DMG to all enemies and regenerates energy for Argenti.

skills.name: Merit Bestowed in "My" Garden
skills.description: Consumes #4[i] Energy and deals Physical DMG to all enemies and additionally deals minor Physical DMG to random single enemy targets for 6 Bounces.

eidolons.name: A Lacuna in Kingdom of Aesthetics
eidolons.description: Each stack of Apotheosis additionally increases CRIT DMG by 4%.

eidolons.name: Agate's Humility
eidolons.description: If the number of enemies on the field equals to 3 or more when the Ultimate is used, ATK increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Thorny Road's Glory
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Trumpet's Dedication
eidolons.description: At the start of battle, gains 2 stack(s) of Apotheosis and increases the maximum stack limit of the Talent's effect by 2.

eidolons.name: Snow, From Somewhere in Cosmos
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: "Your" Resplendence
eidolons.description: When using Ultimate, ignores 30% of enemy targets' DEF.
